document.discussion_title: Romania wins first medal in team epee | WWLP.com
document.topic_text: Romania wins first medal in team epee NBC Olympics.com Published: Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) Romania has won their gold medal bout with China in the women’s team epee competition. The number one ranked team had been viewed as the early favorite to win after they took gold at the 2015 World Championships. This is Romania’s first fencing medal in any of the disciplines and their first medal in Rio. Share this:
